statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: MaCio Teague and Ahmad Thomas each scored 27 points to spark North Carolina-Asheville to an 89-68 win over Longwood Wednesday night.
article.headline: Teague, Thomas lead UNC Asheville past Longwood, 89-68
article.linkText: Teague, Thomas lead UNC Asheville past Longwood, 89-68
article.story: ASHEVILLE, N.C. -- MaCio Teague and Ahmad Thomas each scored 27 points to spark North Carolina-Asheville to an 89-68 win over Longwood Wednesday night. Teague, the Big South Conference Freshman of the Week, has averaged 20 points over the Bulldogs' last three conference games. Thomas, who has scored in double figures in every game this season, hit 9 of 14 shots, including 3 of 7 from long range, and was a perfect 6-for-6 from the free throw line. The Bulldogs shot 54.8 percent from the field (34 of 62), including 10 of 22 from distance. The victory was UNC Asheville's seventh win over Longwood in eight games and keeps the Bulldogs (12-6) tied with Winthrop atop the conference standings at 4-1. Khris Lane put up a season-high 32 points for Longwood (6-10, 3-2). The Lancers were 22 of 50 from the field (44 percent) and just 4 of 14 shots from distance.
